name: MATLAB Toolbox Package
summary: An MLTBX file is a toolbox add-on compressed with Zip compression that adds extra functionality to The MathWorks MATLAB, a programming and numeric computing program for analyzing data, developing algorithms, and building models. It stores all the information required by the add-on, including MATLAB .M and .MLX code files, .MLAPP application projects, and .XML settings files. MATLAB users export and import MLTBX files to share add-ons for the software.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
